body.name: FIFINE Gaming PC USB Microphone, Podcast Condenser Mic with Boom Arm, Pop Filter, Mute Button for Streaming, Twitch, Online Chat, RGB Computer Mic for PS4/5 PC Gamer Youtuber-AmpliGame A6T
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 20 mins
features: [Right Out-of-the-Box] The plug-and-play gaming microphone set is no need additional plug-ins or complicated device setup steps. The USB gamer microphone for PC is compatible with Windows, Mac OS and Mac/PS4/PS5. The streaming microphone end is reversible type-c interface, no trouble to plug the right way in dim game atmosphere. The 8.3ft (2.5m) USB cable is long enough to extend from behind the host to the desktop for clear audio gaming singing recording.

[Cool Lighting Design] Two-tone automatic gradient RGB makes your PC windows microphone icing on the cake. With soft and coordinated light effects, your game video or live streaming will be more rainbow eye-catching via the USB mic with boom arm. Make your channel stands out from ranking list. If you just a game player, the rich RGB on the stream microphone for PC matching with your flowing colors computer accessories can meet the needs of more game atmosphere.

[Easier Function Use] Setting touch-mute button on the top can be easily tapped with one hand, instead of holding the computer microphone for gaming to press a button. Quick mute will not affect your Macbook computer keyboard operation, nor making a ticking sound. The big volume knob control at the bottom of Youtuber microphone makes fine-tuning easier, and you can adjust the volume on the boom stream mic for gaming at will without leaving sights from the game screen.

[Original Sound Reproduction] Working with upgraded condenser USB cardioid microphone capsule, A6T can better achieve energetic and warm vocal, which make it sound like you and your teammates are playing in the same room. Cardioid polar pattern is sensitive to pick up and owns high recognize to the front voice. The PC microphone gaming is very suitable for tactical games to effectively improve communication with teammates.

[Effective Accessories] With wide extensibility, the PC mic with boom arm is great for gamers who have various items on desk. You can pull the podcast microphone near by your mouth when in use, or fold it away to save more space. Shock mount on the gaming microphone for streaming will not loosen, further reducing machine noises and vibrations caused by gaming. External detachable pop filter can reduce popping noise but not block the computer game screen.

Warm Tips-The gaming PC USB microphone set package include, Standing Computer Microphone with Shock Mount*1, Pop Filter*1, Boom Arm Stand with Adapter*1, 8.3ft (2.5m) USB Cable*1, C-clamp*1, User's Manual*1. 2) The RGB microphone stand can mount tightly to the desk up to 2” thick. 3) Please first to loosen the screw on C-clamp, and then to adjust the position of boom arm.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gaming PC USB Microphone Kit FIFINE AmpliGame A6T-USB Gaming Streaming Microphone A6T, USB gaming condenser microphone kit, is featured with automatically gradient RGB, tap-to-mute and mic gain knob. Stream microphone with stand plug and play for computer/PS4/PS5 and MAC OS/Windows. Clear and smooth sound closes the distance between you and your audience. Fashionable atmosphere RGB light makes your streaming video ranking top. Youtuber microphone boom arm allows you to start game voice at any time. Stream microphone set suits for gaming, streaming, podcasts, etc.. A6T RGB Light Display Gaming Mic Kit with Automatically RGB Built in two-tone automatic gradient RGB, stream microphone for gaming presents different styles of color scheme. Stream mic with soft but eye-catching RGB gives your video or live streaming full of novelty and form a harmonious effect with your theme PC device. As a intuitive mute function reminder, RGB will be off when the Youtuber microphone for gaming is muted to reduce recording faults. (Tips: RGB is automatically changing but can not be selected. RGB can only be off when in mute state.)

Quick and Soundless Mute Button Easily tap the touch-mute button on the top of computer microphone for recording with one hand, instead of pressing a button. Windows microphone with mute function will not interrupt your gaming operation, nor making a annoying ticking sound. Easy-to-Reach Gain Knob It is easier to make fine-tuning thanks to the big volume knob control at the bottom of external microphone for laptop. You can focus on your game or streaming while adjusting mic gain on the streaming microphone with boom arm at will

RGB Matches with Game Accessories RGB in automatically changing suit your other computer PC accessories, creating an attractive and fashionable game zone. RGB Highlights Game content Integrate more coordinated RGB lighting into the game you play, pulling you to fully participate in the game scene. Brilliant RGB Automatic gradient RGB lighting develops more game aura.

Clean Voice Makes your teammates hear your instructions clearly Smooth Voice Improves the efficiency of game voice communication Real Detailed Voice Promotes your interaction with your audience Original Sound Reproduction Gives joyful game chatting with your teammates or audience

Is A6T mic compatible with Xbox? This USB gaming microphone is NOT compatible with Xbox, but it works well with PS4/PS5/PC. How I control RGB light color? RGB changes itself automatically but no button on the mic to change colors. If you want to turn off the RGB, you have to mute the mic by the mute button on the top of the mic. AmpliGame A8(ASIN:B09YLM3FNC) is a gaming mic with controllable RGB. How can I adjust the mic gain level? You can adjust the mic gain level only by the gain knob at the bottom of the mic, it doesn't work if you adjust the mic gain level in sound settings. Make sure you turn up the gain knob before you use the mic. What is the maximum thickness that the clamp can handle? The PC gaming microphone boom arm can mount tightly to the desk up to 2.1” thick. Overly rounded or overhanging desktop edges do not make good mounting surfaces.Make sure the C-clamp are resting on the flat surfaces. Does it work with the Android phones or iPhone? We don't recommend using A6T mic with the phones because the phones may not supply sufficient power to the RGB light and the sound quality will be affected. If you have to try, please use a genuine data cable or adapter for connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great beginner mic
reviews.reviewText: i just started getting into making youtube videos and this mic is perfect for the job. it’s a great price for something decent. i also use it for discord amongst other things and it works like a charm. the pop filter also does an amazing job at filtering out harsh noises. this mic also picks up a TON of sound. i could hear the living room from my room with it. overall i think its a great choice for a beginner but definitely not for something very professional. love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely Satisfied with FIFINE Gaming PC USB Microphone
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the FIFINE Gaming PC USB Microphone, and I must say that it has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. As an avid gamer and aspiring content creator, this microphone has become an invaluable tool in enhancing my audio quality and overall experience.First and foremost, the sound quality produced by the FIFINE USB Microphone is exceptional. The condenser mic captures clear and crisp audio, allowing my voice to be heard with remarkable clarity. Whether I am streaming, recording gameplay videos, or participating in online gaming sessions, the microphone delivers professional-grade sound that enhances the overall immersion and engagement for myself and my audience.The inclusion of the boom arm in the package is a game-changer. It provides excellent adjustability, allowing me to position the microphone precisely where I need it. The boom arm is sturdy and holds the microphone securely, eliminating any unwanted vibrations or disturbances during recordings. Its flexibility and versatility have made my setup more efficient and professional-looking.Furthermore, the pop filter that comes with the FIFINE microphone effectively reduces plosive sounds, ensuring a clean and polished audio output. This is particularly beneficial for those who engage in voiceovers, podcasting, or streaming, as it enhances the overall quality of the recordings and eliminates distracting and unpleasant noises.The inclusion of a mute button on the microphone itself adds a layer of convenience and control. With a simple press, I can instantly mute the microphone whenever needed, without fumbling for buttons on my computer or audio interface. This feature is particularly handy during live streaming or when I need to take a quick break without disrupting the flow of my content.In terms of ease of use, the FIFINE USB Microphone is a plug-and-play device. It requires no complicated setup or additional drivers, making it hassle-free and accessible for both beginners and experienced users alike. Simply connect it to your computer's USB port, and you're ready to start recording or streaming.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with the FIFINE Gaming PC USB Microphone. Its exceptional sound quality, adjustable boom arm, effective pop filter, and convenient mute button make it an outstanding choice for gamers, streamers, podcasters, and content creators. If you're looking for a reliable and high-performing microphone that will elevate your audio game, I wholeheartedly recommend the FIFINE USB Microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good but flimsy
reviews.reviewText: I got this mic a while ago that was recommended by my favorite streamer. This mic is amazing. It picks up my voice very well, you can adjust the sound to make your voice louder or quieter, the mute button comes in handy, it doesn't pick up alot of background sound only a little bit, you can screw it into your desk, it moves really well when adjusting it, and the colors are cute! The only problem is that the mic sometimes drops to the side. I kept thinking that mabey I didn't screw in the mic properly but it's just flimsy. As long as you're not to aggressive with it then it'll be fine. Over all this product is amazing and I highly recommend!Side note-(it doesn't cut out when you scream)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light not customizable
reviews.reviewText: It came with a weird smell so I had to clean the pop filter. The sound quality is not bad except that the other end can hear very clearly what's going on around you. The rgb light on this mic was a let down since I was hoping it would be customizable. Still, the colors on this are bright and the gradient is pretty. Cheap boom arm but you get what you pay for. Very impressive for a 50$ microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good bang for the buck
reviews.reviewText: I picked up this mic as I was getting into streaming as a hobby. To my surprise, the quality of the mic is very nice and the gain control knob was a HUGE added bonus. I have been using the mic as my default to separate audio and have been very pleased. Clear sound, the pop filter works as expected. Fifine did an excellent job with the product. The boom arm that was included, while lower quality, does the job until I can invest in higher end products and I couldn't be happier.TLDR: nice mic, works very well after some fine tuning with gain and volumes. Very happy. Def worth a purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great way to start being a content creator.
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing mic with simple tap to mute function. the gain dial is very easy to use. The sound quality is amazing as well. The mechanical arm helps with making the mic more versatile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it!
reviews.reviewText: Love it! The mute tap function works flawlessly and does not trigger on and off randomly as I see in some reviews. The voice volume dial is also pretty neat. Clamp is also sturdy. For sound clarity, all of my friends and work colleagues say I sound VERY clear, no distortion whatsoever. Some even wanted the link for it.Mesh: You dont really notice the smiley face which I like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect budget gaming mic
reviews.reviewText: My headset's mic started echoing in lobbies so I needed to find an alternative. I stumbled upon this and glad I went with it. Everyone I play with says that the audio is crisp and sounds much better now. The arm on this works perfect and articulates with ease. The rgb is just set to a cycle and doesn't sync with your pc's software. So keep that in mind.
Es super bueno al hablar por video llamada virtual en la PC al jugar también sin ningún problema de audio o estatica
Captação do grave bem satisfatório, som limpo e braço bem ajustável, apesar de precisar ficar o mais próximo possível do microfone pra que som fique melhor, mas ainda sim muito bom
This mic is awesome as we know but its capturing background noise.If those are using nvidia rtx voice then its give you best audio without background noise😊

muito bom, áudio perfeito, montagem fácil, braço articulável muito bom
